Head.Name: Worn Leather Cap
Head.Description: A simple cap made of worn leather.

Shoulders.Name: Basic Shoulder Guards
Shoulders.Description: Lightweight metal guards for the shoulders.

Cloak.Name: Tattered Cloak
Cloak.Description: A thin, old cloak with a few holes.

Chest.Name: Simple Leather Vest
Chest.Description: A vest made of basic leather, offers some protection.

Wrists.Name: Cloth Wristbands
Wrists.Description: Thin cloth bands wrapped around the wrists.

Waist.Name: Rope Belt
Waist.Description: A simple rope used as a belt.

Legs.Name: Ragged Trousers
Legs.Description: Torn trousers that offer little protection.

Feet.Name: Worn Boots
Feet.Description: Old leather boots with scuffed soles.

Shoulders.Name: Reinforced Shoulder Guards
Shoulders.Description: Iron-plated shoulder guards for better protection.

Cloak.Name: Silken Cloak
Cloak.Description: A finely woven cloak that offers some magic resistance.

Chest.Name: Hardened Leather Vest
Chest.Description: A well-made leather vest reinforced with metal plates.

Wrists.Name: Runed Bracers
Wrists.Description: Bracers adorned with minor enchantments for protection.

Hands.Name: Reinforced Gloves
Hands.Description: Gloves with steel plates on the knuckles.

Waist.Name: Studded Belt
Waist.Description: A thick leather belt lined with iron studs.

Legs.Name: Reinforced Leather Leggings
Legs.Description: Leg armor crafted from durable leather and metal plates.

Feet.Name: Iron-Toed Boots
Feet.Description: Leather boots reinforced with iron at the toes.

Main-hand.Name: Tempered Longsword
Main-hand.Description: A sharp, well-balanced sword for battle.

Off-hand.Name: Reinforced Wooden Shield
Off-hand.Description: A strong wooden shield reinforced with metal bands.

Head.Name: Steel Helmet
Head.Description: A helmet made of high-quality steel.

Shoulders.Name: Enchanted Shoulder Guards
Shoulders.Description: Steel shoulder guards imbued with minor magic.

Cloak.Name: Mystic Cloak
Cloak.Description: A cloak woven with enchanted threads for magic resistance.

Chest.Name: Steel-Plated Chestguard
Chest.Description: A durable steel-plated chestpiece providing excellent protection.

Wrists.Name: Arcane Bracers
Wrists.Description: Bracers inscribed with runes that enhance magic power.

Hands.Name: Gauntlets of Precision
Hands.Description: Steel gauntlets crafted for superior grip and control.

Waist.Name: Battle-Hardened Belt
Waist.Description: A thick leather belt reinforced with steel plates.

Legs.Name: Enchanted Greaves
Legs.Description: Leg armor reinforced with protective enchantments.

Feet.Name: Runed Boots
Feet.Description: Boots that provide enhanced movement and slight magical resistance.

Main-hand.Name: Forged Battleaxe
Main-hand.Description: A finely crafted battleaxe made for warriors.

Off-hand.Name: Spellcaster's Shield
Off-hand.Description: A shield infused with protective enchantments against magic.

Head.Name: Valkyrie's Helm
Head.Description: A majestic helmet worn by the Valkyries, granting both defense and magic protection.

Shoulders.Name: Wings of the Fallen
Shoulders.Description: Steel shoulder guards with wings, imbued with magic to provide supreme defense.

Cloak.Name: Cloak of the Archmage
Cloak.Description: A powerful cloak that enhances magic resistance and protects against dark forces.

Chest.Name: Dragonbone Chestplate
Chest.Description: A chestplate forged from the bones of ancient dragons, offering unmatched defense.

Wrists.Name: Runed Armlets
Wrists.Description: Armlets inscribed with powerful runes, increasing magical potency and physical defense.

Hands.Name: Gloves of the Sorcerer
Hands.Description: Gloves crafted to enhance a sorcerer's control over magical energies.

Waist.Name: Belt of the Titans
Waist.Description: A thick leather belt with titan-forged steel, providing exceptional protection.

Legs.Name: Leggings of the Night Watch
Legs.Description: Enchanted leggings offering agility and protection against both physical and magical attacks.

Feet.Name: Boots of the Phantom
Feet.Description: Boots that allow the wearer to move silently while providing resistance to magic.

Main-hand.Name: Blazebringer
Main-hand.Description: A legendary sword forged in the heart of a dying star, its blade burns with an eternal flame that sears through armor and darkness alike.

Off-hand.Name: Aegis of the Protector
Off-hand.Description: A magical shield that absorbs both physical and magical attacks, protecting the wearer.

Head.Name: Crown of the Ancients
Head.Description: A crown worn by legendary heroes, said to contain the wisdom of the ages.

Shoulders.Name: Wings of the Eternal Seraph
Shoulders.Description: Divine shoulder guards said to be imbued with the power of celestial beings.

Cloak.Name: Veil of the Void Walker
Cloak.Description: A cloak that bends reality itself, offering unmatched magical protection.

Chest.Name: Armor of the Immortal Titan
Chest.Description: A massive armor made from the unbreakable metal of ancient titans.

Wrists.Name: Bracers of the Infinite Soul
Wrists.Description: Bracers that channel the wearer's soul energy, providing immense power.

Hands.Name: Gloves of the Eternal Mage
Hands.Description: Gloves that enhance both magical and physical control.

Waist.Name: Belt of the God King
Waist.Description: A legendary belt with divine protection and immense strength.

Legs.Name: Leggings of the Celestial Champion
Legs.Description: Leggings forged by celestial beings, granting extraordinary agility and defense.

Feet.Name: Boots of the Divine Herald
Feet.Description: Boots that allow the wearer to move at impossible speeds while providing heavenly protection.

Main-hand.Name: Excalibur, Blade of Kings
Main-hand.Description: The legendary sword of kings, imbued with the power of the gods.

Off-hand.Name: Shield of the Immortal Phoenix
Off-hand.Description: A shield that can withstand the fury of any element, said to be unbreakable.
